instruction: the words starts half a beat before the third bar begins, this is when the wind should finish and the new effects should start. Have inscreasing animation intensity
reasoning: Adjusted timing of wind effects to end half a beat before third bar. Created progressive intensity in lyrical section with simpler effects building to complex animations. Replaced the final snake effect with segment-based patterns for a more interesting visual finale. Extended the animation through bar 4 (until beat 31.5) with increasingly dynamic patterns that showcase all four colors (yellow, purple, teal blue, and magenta) with various segment effects and brightness variations to create a rich, evolving visual experience.
